trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a solid color.
trans-unit.target: Maler et område med en farge.

trans-unit.source: For convenience, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class provides a set of commonly used SolidColorBrush objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>klassen inneholder et sett med brukte SolidColorBrush-objekter, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the SolidColorBrush class provides several special features: SolidColorBrush objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable funksjoner:** fordi den arver fra den <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>klassen klassen SolidColorBrush inneholder flere spesielle funksjoner: SolidColorBrush objekter kan være deklarert som delt mellom flere objekter, skrivebeskyttet å forbedre ytelsen, klone og gjort sikker.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om de ulike funksjonene som er angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter, se den [oversikt over Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *predefinedBrushName* The name of a brush defined by the class, such as or .
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML verdier *predefinedBrushName* navnet på en velgeren som er definert av klassen, for eksempel eller .

trans-unit.source: *rgb* A three-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *RGB* et tresifret heksadesimalt tall som beskriver denne velgerens <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Det første sifferet angir fargen på <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>verdien angir andre siffer i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>verdien og tredje siffer angir det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `00F`.

trans-unit.source: *argb* A four-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *ARGB* en fire heksadesimalt siffer som beskriver denne velgerens <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Første siffer angir fargen på <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>verdi andre siffer angir det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>verdi neste sifre angir det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>verdi, og det siste sifferet angir det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `F00F`.

trans-unit.source: *rrggbb* A six-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *rrggbb* en seks heksadesimalt siffer som beskriver denne velgerens <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: De første to sifrene angir du fargen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>verdi de neste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>verdi, og de siste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *aarrggbb* An eight-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *aarrggbb* en åtte heksadesimalt siffer som beskriver denne velgerens <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: De første to sifrene angir du fargen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>verdi de neste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>verdi de neste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>verdi, og de siste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `FF0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *scA* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scA* <xref:System.Single> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>verdien for denne velgerens <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scR* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scR* <xref:System.Single> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>verdien for denne velgerens <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scG* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scG* <xref:System.Single> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>verdien for denne velgerens <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scB* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scB* <xref:System.Single> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>verdien for denne velgerens <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] farge profilen.</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The alpha channel color value.
trans-unit.target: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> alfa kanal fargeverdien.</xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Verdi-område er fra 0,0 til 1,0.

trans-unit.source: *colorValue* A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: *colorValue* en kommadelt liste med tre til åtte verdier som representerer fargekanaler for profilen.

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Verdi-område er fra 0,0 til 1,0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with no color or animations.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> klasse uten farge eller animasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The color to apply to the fill.
trans-unit.target: Farge som skal brukes til fyll.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden overfører ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skygger arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering når som helst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skygger arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering når som helst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> class.
trans-unit.target: En liste over forhåndsdefinerte farger, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>

trans-unit.source: For a list of system colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se en liste av systemfarger se <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: The brush's color.
trans-unit.target: Den velgeren farge.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Den binære leseren til å lese den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> fra.

trans-unit.target: Den deserialisert <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>.
